body_html:
I just recompiled again. During the installation, one of the messages was:

-- Found CUDA: /usr/local/cuda (found suitable version "8.0", minimum required is "7.0")

However, I still get:

~$ python -c 'import torch; print torch.cuda.is_available()'
False

@SsnL What log file are you referring to?

body:
I just recompiled again. During the installation, one of the messages was:

-- Found CUDA: /usr/local/cuda (found suitable version "8.0", minimum required is "7.0") 

However, I still get: 

~$ python -c 'import torch; print torch.cuda.is_available()'
False

@SsnL What log file are you referring to?
